name: Toast Simulator
description:
In this arcade-style score racking game, you control a falling piece of toast on its way to the carpet. Your job is to stack the most amount of delicious condiments on the toast, all the while dodging flies and hands, and ultimately landing face-down on the carpet. Controls
  • ⬅ (left) key: Move toast left
  • ➡ (right) key: Move toast right
  • A key: rotate toast counter-clockwise
  • D key: rotate toast clockwise
  • Space key: Reset the level
  • Escape key: Exit the level
Gameplay tips

The goal at the end of each level is to land butter-side-down onto the carpet (as every toast should, dictated by the laws of physics).

  • Landing flat on the carpet will give you a big score bonus, try to land as flat as you can with the toppings against the carpet!
  • Chaining flips while in the air will give you a score multiplier, take advantage of this for big points!
  • Collecting jams gives you points and butter gives you BIG points.
  • Collecting flies will deduct points, so dodge them as much as you can.
  • Touching a hand will result in a game over.
  • Toasters can be used up to 3 times to reach higher up in the level.
